entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending late this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Snow mixed with ice pellets early this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022
